name: Monster Orange - Annoying Bouncing Freak
description:
“For every age group”
“Good color combination”
“Gesture control”
__________________________

Love to play monster games? Help these monsters to collect maximum oranges. The beautiful ‘Monster Orange’ is a nice game designed for every age group. Monsters jump on Sew-Saw and try to collect the fruits. You need to control their jump by tilting your phone’s screen sideways so that they land on see-saw every time. This game gives tough challenge to players while making them learn to use both of their hands in better coordination. Blue sky filled with white clouds gives a relaxing experience to your eyes.

+++ GAME FEATURES +++

Colorful graphics

Nice music

Best time killer
